title: Function
description: A function to be used in the IDE

label.description: The label for the function, as shown in the IDE

category.description: The category by which the functions are grouped and shown in the sidebar.

icon.__comment: The list of available values is defined by a set we have available in our framework.
icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the IDE for this function.

options.description: The options that you want configured for the action. These can be referred by name inside the function

yields.description: Determines wether the function can have other functions nested and if so, what the behaviour should be for executing those functions
